function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Atypical climatic variations leading to Rift Valley Fever and malaria epidemics in East Africa","Impact":"Increased risk of epidemics and transmission dynamics","Mitigation":"Instituting vector control activities, community education, and RVF vaccination for animals","Technologies":"Vector control technologies, vaccination technologies","People":"Population of East Africa","Owner":"Healthcare systems and government organizations"},{"Description":"Weak community-level outreach systems for public health","Impact":"Limited ability to address adaptation needs in urban environments","Mitigation":"Building strong community-level outreach systems based around community workers and social services","Technologies":"Community outreach technologies, social intervention technologies","People":"Urban communities","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, social service providers"},{"Description":"Lack of surveillance and monitoring of disease status at the community level","Impact":"Limited ability to detect and respond to disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implementing Health and Demographic Surveillance Systems (HDSS) for longitudinal data collection","Technologies":"Surveillance technologies, data collection technologies","People":"Community members in areas with disease risk","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"}]}
